productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Safely primes teeth for extra teeth whitening in hard-to-reach places while providing fresh breath & healthy gums. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Supersmile Extra Whitening Pre-Rinse Supersmile's Professional Extra Whitening Pre-Rinse developed by Dr. Irwin Smigel, world-renowned "Father of Aesthetic Dentistry" is a whitening mouthwash clinically formulated with powerful ingredients that safely and effectively prime teeth for maximum brightening results. Swish a teaspoonful just before brushing to clean hard-to-reach places and between the teeth, eliminating plaque and gingivitis causing bacteria, and freshening breath. Used in conjunction with Supersmile's line of whitening toothpaste, this powerful pre-rinse will help you achieve the whiter smile you crave! Works on veneers, caps, and dentures. How to use it? Use 1 teaspoonful (5ml) and swish for 30 seconds. Do Not Swallow. Brush as usual without rinsing with water in between. This may be used 1-2 times per day or as needed. For 1st time users or those with pre-existing periodontal conditions or gum sensitivity, dilute with water. Safely primes teeth for maximum whitening resultsMany benefits for a healthier mouthPromotes Healthier Gums and Helps Prevent GingivitisWorks on natural teeth and all dental restorations

Before + After The Supersmile Professional Whitening System removes stains such as coffee, tea, smoking, and red wine using safe, yet powerful whitening agents such as carbamide peroxide. Clinically proven to whiten teeth 9 shades on average and restores bonded teeth, veneers, caps, and dentures to their original shade. *According to a November 2019 study

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product works great and the mint taste is excellent. It does help whiten your teeth of time and works well with toothpaste. Just use this pre-rinse before brushing for a clean mouth feel. I do feel it is a good price value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why is the pre-rents showing two bottles when there’s only one
reviews.reviewText: Everything went well as expected you guys are really good the only question I have is see how it shows two of each item it always only sends one with the mouth free rants I don’t know why they show true when there’s only one that’s my question if you can please get back to me on this with some kind of answer even if you just texted him that is fine I’m just curious because it shows two ones there for the blinds there was two ones and needs shows to prove answers there’s not no to three references so I don’t understand that part

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was an expensive item which I was willing to accept. However, it had leaked when I received it. I didn’t return it because it took too long to get and I needed it. Also, it was mainly full but it was easy to see where it had soaked the package and run down the bottle. Disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my super smile!
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money, gets to me in no time at all. Ulta use to carry it and they don’t any more, why I’m not sure. I can’t live without it! Only problem is I ordered the mint and didn’t get the mint. So you might try a different vendor. I was on my way out of town so I was stuck with what I got, which isn’t right. Starting g to wonder about the credibility of Amazon. Plus I paid extrea for the mint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars effective but medicinal
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a person who wants everything to taste sweet, in fact I find that cloying, but using this liquid requires an effort of dedication, as the taste really does not appeal to me. I do not taste "mint," but very much wish that flavor was indeed present. I do, however, like the idea of a "wash" that you swish before brushing, makes sense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All Supersmile products are excellent!
reviews.reviewText: Ive been using Supersmile products for 10 years. Im 60 years old this year and my teeth are in their best ever condition. I recommend all of the Supersmile products! They are priced higher than others but last forever, way beyond your expectations. You can not achieve these results even with the best regular store brands.I've recently tried their, "extra whitening," line. The pre-rince is the first one so far. One teaspoon, and I mean only one teaspoon plus 30 seconds of swishing is enough to strip all the ick out of your mouth. It even bubbles food particles out from between my teeth and makes them ready for optimal brushing.Its tempting to use the same amount of product that you would have used with the store brands, but dont waste your time or money. Supersmile products work their best as recommended. The results are staggering and immediate. Your dentist will concure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This pre cleanse is amazing the best I’ve found so far! I recently got veneers last year and wanted to be sure I maintained my dental health, whiteness and shine. This product does just that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very effective mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: I love the taste of this mouthwash but even more than the taste, I love the effectiveness of it. It has definitely controlled the occurrence of the plaque on my teeth.It is well worth the money!
